sentence.Network_en: Thanks to that, they do not look so monochromatic.
sentence.Network_cn: 得益于此，他们看起来不才不至于那么单调。

sentence.Network_en: The material must be sensitized for the monochromatic radiation of the laser.
sentence.Network_cn: 此材料必须对该激光器的单色辐射敏感.

sentence.Network_en: This obviously is the limiting case of the idealized monochromatic wave.
sentence.Network_cn: 这必然是理想化的单色波的极限波形.
